survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Telehealth Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and experiences with telehealth services, including satisfaction levels, preferred features, and barriers to adoption.

questions.question_text: How often have you used telehealth services in the past 12 months?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure options cover common usage ranges.

script.question_text: How often have you used telehealth services in the past 12 months?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What types of healthcare services have you used via telehealth? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture diverse service types. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What types of healthcare services have you used via telehealth? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a telehealth service? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Appointment availability (same-day or short wait times)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with a limit of 3 selections to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections set to 3. Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a telehealth service? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Appointment availability (same-day or short wait times)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your most recent telehealth experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and labeled clearly.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your most recent telehealth experience?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telehealth services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
